A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining and fun. I laughed out loud a few times. I get that some die-hard fans have some negative things to say\, but you are never going to get them to like anything!! There is no Jar-Jar to hate\, a few times there were something reflective of the good'ole series... but overall\, it was 2 1/2 hours of a sci-fi adventure that made you believe in the good of people and the unbelievable magic that is Star Wars.
